name: HighsInfo
brief:
Solver output information and statistics

Provides typed info records for solver statistics accessible via API.

**InfoRecord Hierarchy:**
- InfoRecord: Base class (type, name, description, advanced)
- InfoRecordInt64: 64-bit integer info (mip_node_count)
- InfoRecordInt: Integer info (iteration counts, status codes)
- InfoRecordDouble: Double info (objective, infeasibilities)

**HighsInfoStruct/HighsInfo:**
- Iteration counts: simplex, ipm, crossover, pdlp, qp
- Solution status: primal_solution_status, dual_solution_status
- Objective: objective_function_value
- MIP statistics: mip_node_count, mip_dual_bound, mip_gap
- Infeasibility metrics: num/max/sum primal/dual infeasibilities
- Residuals: primal/dual residual errors (absolute and relative)
- Complementarity: violation counts and max violation

**Functions:**
- getInfoIndex(): Look up info by name
- getLocalInfoValue(): Retrieve int/int64/double values
- writeInfoToFile()/reportInfo(): Output info records
